name: Unsplash Add-On
description: A Firefox Add-On That Utilizes Unsplash.com On Each New Tab
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://api.unsplash.com/; script-src 'self' https://ajax.googleapis.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline';
